name: Metagame: Chapters 1 & 2
description:
I made this when I was 14. It's cringe.

Some kid downloads a ton of mods for a random isekai game. One of them is a virus that blows open his firewall and lets other players in. And one of them causes the npcs to become self aware that they're in a video game and start freaking out and rebelling.

There are no random encounters, all enemies are visible on the map.  There is focus on gameplay, story, and comedy. The combined experience of Chapters 1 and 2 is about three hours long if you know what to do.

Read the manual for more information. Gonna call this a beta version because im certain I forgor something i'll have to fix
